text: Yi-Fu Tuan (Traditional Chinese: 段義孚; December 5, 1930 - August 10, 2022) was a Chinese-American geographer. He was an important person in the creation of human geography and humanistic geography. Tuan was born in Tianjin (or Tientsin), China. He was a professor at the University of Wisconsin-Madison. ==Death== Tuan died on August 10, 2022 in Madison, Wisconsin at the age of 91.段義孚：為避免幽閉恐懼症，人類需要將整個宇宙當成遊樂場 ==Other websites== * Yi-Fu Tuan's homepage * June 24, 2007 Milwaukee Journal Sentinel article about the professor ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2022 deaths Category:20th-century Chinese writers Category:Chinese scientists Category:Chinese academics Category:American geographers Category:Academics from Wisconsin Category:Writers from Madison, Wisconsin Category:Scientists from Madison, Wisconsin Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:21st- century Chinese writers
